info.description: The Customer service APIs allows modification of Customer, with specific APIs for Corporate or Individual Customers, update and information retrieval APIs for specific information like Address, secondary address, credit score, KYC, relation, beneficial ownership information for corporates, etc,.
info.title: Updates retrieves Customer and address information

get.summary: API to search and retreive Customer information based on customerName, date of birth, date of incorporation, SSN or TIN, and Mobile number

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: customerName
parameters.description: Name of the customer

parameters.name: taxId
parameters.description: Holds the Customer's TAX/SSN Id.

parameters.name: dateOfBirth
parameters.description: The date of birth of an individual customer

parameters.name: birthIncorpDate
parameters.description: Date on which the entity is incorporated

parameters.name: mobileNumber
parameters.description: Mobile number of the customer

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Retrieves Corporate Customer information. Unless there is a specific set of information to be updated for which a separate APIs exists, this generic API can be used where all available information can be retreived.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.summary: Updates Corporate Customer information. Unless there is a specific set of information to be updated for which a separate APIs exists, this generic API can be used where all available information can be updated..

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Retrieves Individual Customer information. Unless there is a specific set of information to be updated for which a separate APIs exists, this generic API can be used where all available information for an individual Customer can be  retreived.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.summary: Updates Individual Customer information. Unless there is a specific set of information to be updated for which a separate APIs exists, this generic API can be used where all information for an individual Customer can be updated.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Retrieves all available mail addresses for a Customer along with information on the purpose of the address(Primary, office, etc,.), internal address reference.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Retrieves the credit score information available for a customer. If a credit agency is provided, credit related to that agency alone is provided.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: agencyId
parameters.description: Name of the agency that provided the credit score. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName CREDIT.BUREAU

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Retrieves the credit score information available for a customer related to that reporting agency provided.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: agencyId
parameters.description: Name of the agency that provided the credit score. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName CREDIT.BUREAU

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: page_start

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

title.description: Main menu title or header which the user wants to display on the screen when requesting the display of this main menu. This field can be expanded to allow the user to enter the description of the main menu in various languages.

lastName.description: The last name of an individual customer

nameSuffix.description: Post-nominal letters that indicate that the individual holds a position, educational degree, accreditation, office, or honor.Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName USREGS.CUS.SUFFIX

Post-nominal letters that indicate that the individual holds a position, educational degree, accreditation, office, or honor.Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName USREGS.CUS.SUFFIX

nationalityId.description: The identifier of the nationality of a customer

country.description: Identifies the country of the customer.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of an individual customer

birthIncorpDate.description: Date on which the entity is incorporated

branch.description: The branch information relevant to this BIC code.

sectorId.description: An institution-defined identifier of the type of customer

target.description: Specifies how the Customer is considered by the bank and how he fits in with the Account Officer's overall marketing strategy

naicsCode.description: NAICS Code linked to the occupation or type of business of the Customer

city.description: City address stated on driver licence or utlility bill. For example London, New York etc.

stateId.description: Represents the US State to which the address belongs to.

addressStatus.description: Indicates the status of customer mailing address like foreign address, mailing address, bad address, etc.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

legalId.description: Unique reference number of the legal documents submitted as identification proof

legalDocumentName.description: Name of the legal documents such as passport, driving licence etc., provided as identification proof

legalHolderName.description: Name of the account holder in the Legal Document
enum: Specifies any legal identification of the Customer

legalIssueAuthorisedDate.description: Authority who issued the legal document

legalIssueDate.description: Date of Issue of the legal document

legalExpiredDate.description: Expiry date of the legal document submitted as proof

relationshipCode.description: Relationship identifier between the partyType and relatedPartyType

relationPartyId.description: Related customers or persons/entities that are part of the relationship.

jointRelationRoleId.description: Role of joint customer with the main customer

owningPercent.description: Used to record the percentage of ownership in the relationship. For example an entity may be partially or wholly owned by another entity. This will only be allowed to be entered if the relation is indicated as a type allowing Ownership

changeReason.description: Specifies the reason (if any) for any status change

communicationType.description: Communication type to the customer, as defined by the institution. E.g. Proposal, Alert, Campaign, New Product Update, Robinson List, Statement.

preferredChannel.description: Preferred method of contact to the customer

deviceDetails.description: Communication or contact information. Can be phone or fax number or email id

devicePrivacy.description: Indicates if the communication device listed can be shared. Listed indicates that the contact information can be shared. Unlisted indicates that the information cannot be made public.

overrideReason.description: Reason for changing the customer's risk class from the calculated risk class.
Reason for changing the customer's risk class from the calculated risk class.

Names.description: Short title for the Account to be created

enum: Defaulted if Given or family name is mentioned

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

profileType.description: Identifies the type of profile that can be assigned to the customer. Bank needs to profile its clients in order to be effective in cross selling and campaign management.

profile.description: Identifies the profile that can be assigned to the customer. Bank needs to profile its clients in order to be effective in cross selling and campaign management.

override.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.
The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

inputter.description: The user identifier who input the transaction
The user identifier who input the transaction

dateTime.description: Contains the date and time separated by '-'
Contains the date and time separated by '-'

enum: Defaulted if Given or family name is mentioned
Defaulted if Given or family name is mentioned

shortName.description: Contains the name of the account, basically the short title of the account.

birthIncorpDate.description: Date on which the entity is incorporated

sectorId.description: An institution-defined identifier of the type of customer

appliedOrCertified.description: Indicates whether the TIN or SSN is certified, applied or not certified

accountOfficerId.description: The identifier of the department head or specific account officer responsible for the customer

naicsCode.description: NAICS Code linked to the occupation or type of business of the Customer

customerContactIndicator.description: Flag to indicate if Customer made contact. If set to YES, contact date will be updated with system date

enum: Specifies the first line of Customer's address.
Specifies the second line of Customer's address.

city.description: City address stated on driver licence or utlility bill. For example London, New York etc.

stateId.description: Represents the US State to which the address belongs to.

country.description: Identifies the country of the customer.

addressStatus.description: Indicates the status of customer mailing address like foreign address, mailing address, bad address, etc.

taxCertificationType.description: Taxpayer certification type code for W8 and W9 customer. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName TAX.CERT.TYPE

reasonForMissingFtin.description: Reason for non-availability of foreign tax identification number information. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName FTIN.MIS.REASON

fTINInformation.description: Additional information about Foreign tax identification number.

giin.description: Specifies the Global Intermediary Identification Numbers of financial institutions

taxTreatyBenefits.description: A treaty between the United States and a foreign country that may provide foreign taxpayer an exemption from, or a reduced rate, of withholding for certain items of income.

taxTreatyLimitationType.description: Captures any limitation of the tax treaty benefits. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName TX.TREATY.LIM.TYPE

taxWithholding.description: Indicates if Backup with holding tax will be applied or not for the customer. Updated by system based on tax information provided by the customer. Y indicates that bank will withold tax from the customer on interest payments or other non-taxed earnings. N indicates that the Financial institution will not withhold tax.

taxTreatyCountry.description: Indicates the tax treaty country if the customer nationality belongs to one of tax treaty countries with US

taxWithholdingApplied.description: Capture the type of witholding taxes to be applied for the customer. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName WHT.APPLIED

taxEntityType.description: Capture the internal revenue code (Chapter 3) for withholding tax payers(Non-residents and foreign corporations). Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName TX.ENT.TYPE.CODE

taxWithholdingReason.description: Describes the reason tax was withheld

taxClassificationCode.description: Tax classification code of customer for W9 form. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName W9.TAX.CLASS.CODE

taxClassificationCodeOther.description: Reason for mentioning tax classification code is mentioned as Other

w8w9StatusChangeDate.description: Date change Tax status changes from W8 to W9

w9PayeeExcempCode.description: Reason a W9 Customer or corporation is exempt from Tax. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName W9.PAYE.EXM.CDE

fatcaExcemptionType.description: Reason a W9 Customer or corporation is exempt from Tax reporting.  Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName W9.EXEM.FATCA

ownershipRuleId.description: Capture the rule id that defines the Beneficial ownership information required for the Customer. The rule will be defined in the system based on the customer type and determines which of the beneficiary rule information like ownership, control person and certifier details are mandatory for a corporate customer type or group.

noOwnerGt25Percent.description: Flag to indicate if any related Customer owns more than 25,. If set to Y, it indicates that atleast one of beneficiary owns more than 25,

otherOwnersLt25PercentFlag.description: Flag to indicate if all owners own less than 25,

certifierName.description: Name of the person who certifies the Beneficial Ownership details

certifierTitle.description: Title of the person who certifies the Beneficial Ownership details

additionalTitle.description: Additional Title information of the customer or certifier

certificationDate.description: Corporate customers should declare the ownership information among its partners and it has to be verified by a certifier. Holds information on the date when the Ownership information was certified  by an authorised certifier.

privacyNoticeFrequency.description: Financial institutions has to share their privacy policies and record the customers choice in opting in or out in sharing personal information with their marketing partners and affliates. The frequency date records the date when next annual privacy notice has to be sent to the customer.

communicationMode.description: The communication method that will be followed by the financial institution to share the privacy policy, the information that will be shared etc., to the customer

privacyStatus.description: Indicates if the customer has choosen to Opt-in or Opt-out in sharing personal information.

statusChangeDate.description: Identifies the effective date of change of Fatca status

ctrExempt.description: Indicates if customer is exempt from CTR(Currency transaction reporting) or not. If set to YES, CTR report will not be generated for the customer when the cumulative transactions for the day was more than 10,000 dollars.

ctrExemptReason.description: Holds the reason for marking the customer as CTR exempt.  Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName EXEMPT.REASON

escheat.description: Flag to indicate if Customer is in escheat status. When set to Y, escheat process will be triggered by system during close of business. Also updated as Y by system based on definition for automatic escheat process.

contactDate.description: Date that first contact was made with the Customer.

additionalInformation.description: Additional Information provided to add context

regGGCertification.description: All commercial or corporate customers should certify that they do not engage in Internet gambling. If they do engage in internet gamling, it should through lawful means. Capture if certification related to customer is not involved in internet  gambling or not and if involved in lawful internet gambling has it been verified and certified.

regGGCertficationDate.description: Date when customers Regulation GG certification status was updated

affiliateMarketingStatus.description: Captures the customers decision to opt-in or opt-out of sharing maketing information to the bank affiliates

affiliateMarketingStatusDate.description: The date when the customer gave the decision for sharing maketing information to the bank affiliates.

affiliateMarketingExpirationDate.description: Date of expiry of affiliate marketing concurrence provide by Customer

spokenLanguage.description: Customers native language or the language that can be used for communication

isMobileBankingService.description: Indicates whether is Customer is subscribed to the mobile banking service or not.

isInternetBankingService.description: Indicates whether is Customer is subscribed to the internet banking service or not.

introducer.description: Name of the person who introduced the Customer to the bank

kycRelationship.description: Indicates the Customer Relationship details of the customer

kycLastReviewDate.description: Date customer KYC information was last reviewed

kycNextSystemReviewDate.description: Date system has calculated customer should next be reviewed.

kycNextReviewDate.description: Next date of KYC review defined manually by the User

amlCheck.description: Describe the legal controls that is required by institutions to prevent or report Anti Money Laundering activities. It can have YES, SENT or NULL values.

amlResult.description: Describe the results of Anti Money Laundering.

amlLastResultDate.description: The last date when Anti Money Laundering result is performed and updated

manualRiskClass.description: Customer's risk class updated manually by the User overriding the risk class calculated by the KYC process

isKycComplete.description: Whether information related to the customer has been collected and verified

mnemonic.description: Shortcut code for referring an Entity/Company/Branch.
enum: Specifies an easy means of referencing Customer

languageId.description: Represents the language code of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

target.description: Specifies how the Customer is considered by the bank and how he fits in with the Account Officer's overall marketing strategy

customerStatus.description: The internal bank status of a customer

branch.description: The branch information relevant to this BIC code.

customerSince.description: Date Since Customer is held in the system

recordStatus.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

currNo.description: Current Number which indicates how many times the record is modified.

authoriser.description: This indicates the user who authorized the transaction.

companyCode.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

deptCode.description: The department code where the transaction was authorized.

auditTimeDate.description: Reference to the audit date and time.

options.description: The usable options for the override

The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

statusChangeDate.description: Identifies the effective date of change of Fatca status

ctrExempt.description: Indicates if customer is exempt from CTR(Currency transaction reporting) or not. If set to YES, CTR report will not be generated for the customer when the cumulative transactions for the day was more than 10,000 dollars.

ctrExemptReason.description: Holds the reason for marking the customer as CTR exempt.  Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName EXEMPT.REASON

contactDate.description: Date that first contact was made with the Customer.

additionalInformation.description: Additional Information provided to add context

regGGCertification.description: All commercial or corporate customers should certify that they do not engage in Internet gambling. If they do engage in internet gamling, it should through lawful means. Capture if certification related to customer is not involved in internet  gambling or not and if involved in lawful internet gambling has it been verified and certified.

regGGCertficationDate.description: Date when customers Regulation GG certification status was updated

affiliateMarketingStatus.description: Captures the customers decision to opt-in or opt-out of sharing maketing information to the bank affiliates

affiliateMarketingStatusDate.description: The date when the customer gave the decision for sharing maketing information to the bank affiliates.

affiliateMarketingExpirationDate.description: Date of expiry of affiliate marketing concurrence provide by Customer

spokenLanguage.description: Customers native language or the language that can be used for communication

isMobileBankingService.description: Indicates whether is Customer is subscribed to the mobile banking service or not.

isInternetBankingService.description: Indicates whether is Customer is subscribed to the internet banking service or not.

introducer.description: Name of the person who introduced the Customer to the bank

kycRelationship.description: Indicates the Customer Relationship details of the customer

kycLastReviewDate.description: Date customer KYC information was last reviewed

kycNextSystemReviewDate.description: Date system has calculated customer should next be reviewed.

kycNextReviewDate.description: Next date of KYC review defined manually by the User

amlCheck.description: Describe the legal controls that is required by institutions to prevent or report Anti Money Laundering activities. It can have YES, SENT or NULL values.

amlResult.description: Describe the results of Anti Money Laundering.

amlLastResultDate.description: The last date when Anti Money Laundering result is performed and updated

manualRiskClass.description: Customer's risk class updated manually by the User overriding the risk class calculated by the KYC process

isKycComplete.description: Whether information related to the customer has been collected and verified

mnemonic.description: Shortcut code for referring an Entity/Company/Branch.
enum: Specifies an easy means of referencing Customer

languageId.description: Represents the language code of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

target.description: Specifies how the Customer is considered by the bank and how he fits in with the Account Officer's overall marketing strategy

customerStatus.description: The internal bank status of a customer

branch.description: The branch information relevant to this BIC code.

customerSince.description: Date Since Customer is held in the system

recordStatus.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

currNo.description: Current Number which indicates how many times the record is modified.

authoriser.description: This indicates the user who authorized the transaction.

companyCode.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

deptCode.description: The department code where the transaction was authorized.

auditTimeDate.description: Reference to the audit date and time.

legalId.description: Unique reference number of the legal documents submitted as identification proof

legalDocumentName.description: Name of the legal documents such as passport, driving licence etc., provided as identification proof

legalHolderName.description: Name of the account holder in the Legal Document
enum: Specifies any legal identification of the Customer

legalIssueAuthorisedDate.description: Authority who issued the legal document

legalIssueDate.description: Date of Issue of the legal document

legalExpiredDate.description: Expiry date of the legal document submitted as proof

employStartDate.description: Starting date of the customer's employment

employerAddress.description: The address of the customer's employer.

employerBusiness.description: The business of customer's employer involved.

salaryCurrency.description: Currency in which the Salary information of the customer is maintained

salaryAmount.description: Gross Salary details of the customer

salaryFrequency.description: Indicates the payment frequency of salary.

creditScoreDate.description: Date when credit score was updated

creditReportingAgency.description: Name of the agency that provided the credit score. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName CREDIT.BUREAU

relation.description: Identifies the inter-relationship between customer with other customers

relationshipCode.description: Relationship identifier between the partyType and relatedPartyType

relationPartyId.description: Related customers or persons/entities that are part of the relationship.

jointRelationDeliveryOption.description: This is used to specify what delivery addressing is to be used for the link customer.

jointRelationRoleId.description: Role of joint customer with the main customer

owningPercent.description: Used to record the percentage of ownership in the relationship. For example an entity may be partially or wholly owned by another entity. This will only be allowed to be entered if the relation is indicated as a type allowing Ownership

customerLiability.description: Indicates the customer consolidation number for credit grouping purposes, within the same branch/country.

changeReason.description: Specifies the reason (if any) for any status change

residenceStatus.description: Residence Status of the Customer for CRM purpose like Owner, Tenant, Householder, Nester etc.

residenceType.description: Residence type of the customer like Farmhouse, Independent house, Residential Apartment, Serviced Apartments

residenceSince.description: The date since the user has obtained the residence.

residenceValue.description: Market Value of the customer's residence

residenceMortgageValue.description: Mortgage value of the residence property of the customer

communicationType.description: Communication type to the customer, as defined by the institution. E.g. Proposal, Alert, Campaign, New Product Update, Robinson List, Statement.

preferredChannel.description: Preferred method of contact to the customer

deviceDetails.description: Communication or contact information. Can be phone or fax number or email id

devicePrivacy.description: Indicates if the communication device listed can be shared. Listed indicates that the contact information can be shared. Unlisted indicates that the information cannot be made public.

overrideReason.description: Reason for changing the customer's risk class from the calculated risk class.
Reason for changing the customer's risk class from the calculated risk class.

Names.description: Short title for the Account to be created

enum: Defaulted if Given or family name is mentioned

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

profileType.description: Identifies the type of profile that can be assigned to the customer. Bank needs to profile its clients in order to be effective in cross selling and campaign management.

profile.description: Identifies the profile that can be assigned to the customer. Bank needs to profile its clients in order to be effective in cross selling and campaign management.

override.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.
The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

inputter.description: The user identifier who input the transaction
The user identifier who input the transaction

dateTime.description: Contains the date and time separated by '-'
Contains the date and time separated by '-'

title.description: Main menu title or header which the user wants to display on the screen when requesting the display of this main menu. This field can be expanded to allow the user to enter the description of the main menu in various languages.
enum: Holds the title for the customer's name

lastName.description: The last name of an individual customer

nameSuffix.description: Post-nominal letters that indicate that the individual holds a position, educational degree, accreditation, office, or honor.Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName USREGS.CUS.SUFFIX

nationalityId.description: The identifier of the nationality of a customer

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of an individual customer

sectorId.description: An institution-defined identifier of the type of customer

accountOfficerId.description: The identifier of the department head or specific account officer responsible for the customer
enum: Account Officer responsible for the Customer

appliedOrCertified.description: Indicates whether the TIN or SSN is certified, applied or not certified

customerContactIndicator.description: Flag to indicate if Customer made contact. If set to YES, contact date will be updated with system date

inActiveMilitaryService.description: Indicates if customer or account holder is in active military service

enum: Specifies the first line of Customer's address.
Specifies the second line of Customer's address.

city.description: City address stated on driver licence or utlility bill. For example London, New York etc.

stateId.description: Represents the US State to which the address belongs to.

country.description: Identifies the country of the customer.

addressStatus.description: Indicates the status of customer mailing address like foreign address, mailing address, bad address, etc.

taxCertificationType.description: Taxpayer certification type code for W8 and W9 customer. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName TAX.CERT.TYPE

reasonForMissingFtin.description: Reason for non-availability of foreign tax identification number information. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName FTIN.MIS.REASON

fTINInformation.description: Additional information about Foreign tax identification number.

giin.description: Specifies the Global Intermediary Identification Numbers of financial institutions

taxTreatyBenefits.description: A treaty between the United States and a foreign country that may provide foreign taxpayer an exemption from, or a reduced rate, of withholding for certain items of income.

taxTreatyLimitationType.description: Captures any limitation of the tax treaty benefits. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName TX.TREATY.LIM.TYPE

taxWithholding.description: Indicates if Backup with holding tax will be applied or not for the customer. Updated by system based on tax information provided by the customer. Y indicates that bank will withold tax from the customer on interest payments or other non-taxed earnings. N indicates that the Financial institution will not withhold tax.

taxTreatyCountry.description: Indicates the tax treaty country if the customer nationality belongs to one of tax treaty countries with US

taxWithholdingApplied.description: Capture the type of witholding taxes to be applied for the customer. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName WHT.APPLIED

taxEntityType.description: Capture the internal revenue code (Chapter 3) for withholding tax payers(Non-residents and foreign corporations). Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName TX.ENT.TYPE.CODE

taxWithholdingReason.description: Describes the reason tax was withheld

taxClassificationCode.description: Tax classification code of customer for W9 form. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName W9.TAX.CLASS.CODE

taxClassificationCodeOther.description: Reason for mentioning tax classification code is mentioned as Other

w8w9StatusChangeDate.description: Date change Tax status changes from W8 to W9

w9PayeeExcempCode.description: Reason a W9 Customer or corporation is exempt from Tax. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName W9.PAYE.EXM.CDE

fatcaExcemptionType.description: Reason a W9 Customer or corporation is exempt from Tax reporting.  Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName W9.EXEM.FATCA

netMonthlyIncome.description: Net income earned by customer each month.

netMonthlyExpense.description: Net expenses of customer each month.

privacyNoticeFrequency.description: Financial institutions has to share their privacy policies and record the customers choice in opting in or out in sharing personal information with their marketing partners and affliates. The frequency date records the date when next annual privacy notice has to be sent to the customer.

communicationMode.description: The communication method that will be followed by the financial institution to share the privacy policy, the information that will be shared etc., to the customer

privacyStatus.description: Indicates if the customer has choosen to Opt-in or Opt-out in sharing personal information.

statusChangeDate.description: Identifies the effective date of change of Fatca status

customerContactFlag.description: Flag to indicate if Customer information was modified based on Customer request

agencyId.description: Name of the agency that provided the credit score. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName CREDIT.BUREAU

documentId.description: Based on documentCode, the field defaults the required document codes

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

status.description: Status identifier of the account. The values are 'DELETED' if the account is closed, 'BLOCKED' is there are any posting restrictions & 'ENABLED' for active accounts.

statusChangeDate.description: Identifies the effective date of change of Fatca status

stateId.description: Represents the US State to which the address belongs to.

countryOfIssue.description: Country where the document was issued

issuedBy.description: The issuer of a security or a bond.

issueDate.description: The date the item was issued.

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

receivedDate.description: Identifies the date on which the document was received

additionalInformation.description: Additional Information provided to add context

imageReference.description: Indicates the reference no. E.g. contract no./customer no./payments no. to which the image/document is attached to

taxClassificationCode.description: Tax classification code of customer for W9 form. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName W9.TAX.CLASS.CODE

taxClassificationCodeOther.description: Reason for mentioning tax classification code is mentioned as Other

w8w9StatusChangeDate.description: Date change Tax status changes from W8 to W9

w9PayeeExcempCode.description: Reason a W9 Customer or corporation is exempt from Tax. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName W9.PAYE.EXM.CDE

fatcaExcemptionType.description: Reason a W9 Customer or corporation is exempt from Tax reporting.  Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName W9.EXEM.FATCA

introducer.description: Name of the person who introduced the Customer to the bank

contactDate.description: Date that first contact was made with the Customer.

kycRelationship.description: Indicates the Customer Relationship details of the customer

kycLastReviewDate.description: Date customer KYC information was last reviewed

amlCheck.description: Describe the legal controls that is required by institutions to prevent or report Anti Money Laundering activities. It can have YES, SENT or NULL values.

amlResult.description: Describe the results of Anti Money Laundering.

amlLastResultDate.description: The last date when Anti Money Laundering result is performed and updated

manualRiskClass.description: Customer's risk class updated manually by the User overriding the risk class calculated by the KYC process

overrideReason.description: Reason for changing the customer's risk class from the calculated risk class.

isKycComplete.description: Whether information related to the customer has been collected and verified

taxCertificationType.description: Taxpayer certification type code for W8 and W9 customer. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName TAX.CERT.TYPE

reasonForMissingFtin.description: Reason for non-availability of foreign tax identification number information. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName FTIN.MIS.REASON

fTINInformation.description: Additional information about Foreign tax identification number.

giin.description: Specifies the Global Intermediary Identification Numbers of financial institutions

taxTreatyBenefits.description: A treaty between the United States and a foreign country that may provide foreign taxpayer an exemption from, or a reduced rate, of withholding for certain items of income.

taxTreatyLimitationType.description: Captures any limitation of the tax treaty benefits. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName TX.TREATY.LIM.TYPE

taxWithholding.description: Indicates if Backup with holding tax will be applied or not for the customer. Updated by system based on tax information provided by the customer. Y indicates that bank will withold tax from the customer on interest payments or other non-taxed earnings. N indicates that the Financial institution will not withhold tax.

taxTreatyCountry.description: Indicates the tax treaty country if the customer nationality belongs to one of tax treaty countries with US

taxWithholdingApplied.description: Capture the type of witholding taxes to be applied for the customer. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName WHT.APPLIED

taxEntityType.description: Capture the internal revenue code (Chapter 3) for withholding tax payers(Non-residents and foreign corporations). Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName TX.ENT.TYPE.CODE

taxWithholdingReason.description: Describes the reason tax was withheld

taxClassificationCode.description: Tax classification code of customer for W9 form. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName W9.TAX.CLASS.CODE

taxClassificationCodeOther.description: Reason for mentioning tax classification code is mentioned as Other

w8w9StatusChangeDate.description: Date change Tax status changes from W8 to W9

w9PayeeExcempCode.description: Reason a W9 Customer or corporation is exempt from Tax. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName W9.PAYE.EXM.CDE

fatcaExcemptionType.description: Reason a W9 Customer or corporation is exempt from Tax reporting.  Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName W9.EXEM.FATCA

override.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.
The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

inputter.description: The user identifier who input the transaction
The user identifier who input the transaction

dateTime.description: Contains the date and time separated by '-'
Contains the date and time separated by '-'

enum: Specifies the first line of Customer's address.
Specifies the second line of Customer's address.

city.description: City address stated on driver licence or utlility bill. For example London, New York etc.

stateId.description: Represents the US State to which the address belongs to.

country.description: Identifies the country of the customer.

addressStatus.description: Indicates the status of customer mailing address like foreign address, mailing address, bad address, etc.

addressLocation.description: Identifies the nature of the postal address, like primary, secondary or office address

addressPurpose.description: Identifies the purpose or usage of the address. Allowed values are CTC (Communication to Customer), CTICOP(Communication to In Care Of Party) or CTOP(Communication to Other Party).

recordStatus.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

currNo.description: Current Number which indicates how many times the record is modified.

authoriser.description: This indicates the user who authorized the transaction.

companyCode.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

deptCode.description: The department code where the transaction was authorized.

auditTimeDate.description: Reference to the audit date and time.

relationshipCode.description: Relationship identifier between the partyType and relatedPartyType

relationPartyId.description: Related customers or persons/entities that are part of the relationship.

jointRelationRoleId.description: Role of joint customer with the main customer

owningPercent.description: Used to record the percentage of ownership in the relationship. For example an entity may be partially or wholly owned by another entity. This will only be allowed to be entered if the relation is indicated as a type allowing Ownership

ownershipRuleId.description: Capture the rule id that defines the Beneficial ownership information required for the Customer. The rule will be defined in the system based on the customer type and determines which of the beneficiary rule information like ownership, control person and certifier details are mandatory for a corporate customer type or group.

noOwnerGt25Percent.description: Flag to indicate if any related Customer owns more than 25,. If set to Y, it indicates that atleast one of beneficiary owns more than 25,

otherOwnersLt25PercentFlag.description: Flag to indicate if all owners own less than 25,

certifierName.description: Name of the person who certifies the Beneficial Ownership details

certifierTitle.description: Title of the person who certifies the Beneficial Ownership details

additionalTitle.description: Additional Title information of the customer or certifier

certificationDate.description: Corporate customers should declare the ownership information among its partners and it has to be verified by a certifier. Holds information on the date when the Ownership information was certified  by an authorised certifier.

shortName.description: Contains the name of the account, basically the short title of the account.

city.description: City address stated on driver licence or utlility bill. For example London, New York etc.

stateId.description: Represents the US State to which the address belongs to.

country.description: Identifies the country of the customer.

customerContactIndicator.description: Flag to indicate if Customer made contact. If set to YES, contact date will be updated with system date

addressStatus.description: Indicates the status of customer mailing address like foreign address, mailing address, bad address, etc.

taxAddressType.description: Captures how the address can be used for tax purposes. Allowed values can be retrieved through getEbLookups for virtualTableName IRS.ADDRESS.TYPE

addressPurpose.description: Identifies the purpose or usage of the address. Allowed values are CTC (Communication to Customer), CTICOP(Communication to In Care Of Party) or CTOP(Communication to Other Party).
